WorkItem.Description:
Hi.
I just checked out a copy of rawr's source code, to take a look if i could find a quick solution for the inteligence issue on the tree module.
 
I believe i checked out most if not all of the points necessary in order to compile:
 
Install .NET Framework 3.5SP1   - Check 
Install Visual Studio 2010           - Check (professional)
Install Visual Studio 2010 SP1     - Not checked (is it mandatory? As i read, SP1 is still on beta, and breaks a few things i don't wanna break on this installation)
Install Silverlight 4                     - Check
Install Silverlight Tools               - Check
Install Silverlight Toolkit             - Check
 
I downloaded the source code via svn.
 
Open Rawr/Rawr4/Rawr4.sln                                         - Check
Rawr.Silverlight.Web project,  "Set as Startup Project..."   - Check
Make VS always use IE for debugging:                           - Check
 
I cleaned the project, and then rebuilt it. I find these erros:

Did i miss any point? the modules it complains about, (first 3 warnings), are all present in the code. The compiling output (attached), seems to say that the modules are not selected for compiling. Should i have not cleaned the project (old habit of mine :D)?

Comments.Message: Yeah, I see the Rogue Errors as well, but the DK stuff should be working.  (but then of-course it "works on my machine")

It compiles already. TY.
I'll take a look on the tree model, and see if i can work something out.
